data.title: How to search and browse Netflix
data.meta_description: Search for Netflix movies and TV shows by signing in to your account and using the Search Bar. You can search by title, actor, categories, genre, and more.
data.text:
Browsing

Your homepage shows rows of TV shows and movies we think youâ€™ll like. You can narrow these suggestions by selecting TV Shows or Movies from the menu. You can further narrow by Genres or Categories. The name of this selection, and its values, may vary between devices.

To find recently released TV shows and movies, visit New & Popular, Latest, or New & Hot from the menu (section name varies based on your device).
